name: Plexyfin
description: Syncs collections, artwork, and their metadata from your Plex Media Server to Jellyfin.
overview: Plugin for Jellyfin that syncs collections and artwork from Plex to Jellyfin

versions.changelog:
- Fix mixed media collections (movies + TV shows) being clobbered during sync
- Add episode sync functionality
- Implement parallel processing for improved performance
- Fix compatibility with Jellyfin 10.10+ by replacing deprecated GetItemList with GetItemsResult
- Add support for multiple versions of media items (cross-library duplicates and same-library editions)
- Implement filesystem-based matching to handle different Plex/Jellyfin mount points
- Fix scheduled sync logic to run when any sync tasks are enabled (not just collections)

- Fixed scheduled sync not working when collection sync is disabled (issue #6)
- Added notification to restart Jellyfin when scheduled sync settings change
- Improved scheduled sync configuration UI with helpful instructions
- Use external IDs for more reliable Plex-Jellyfin matching (issue #7)
- Removed unused Jellyfin Base URL configuration option
- Fixed scheduled sync note visibility in dark themes

- Add image clearing before saving during sync
- Clear all Primary and Backdrop images before saving new ones
- Add robust error handling for file operations
- Add warning messages about image deletion to UI and docs
- Remove the test artwork functionality
Simplifies collection syncs and adds correct sync for sort titles

- Removed watch state synchronization for a more focused plugin
- Improved collection sync with better progress tracking
- Added dry run capability for testing synchronization
- Improved UI progress display with more informative updates
